resources.string:
• covid19india.org for India specific API. 
• corona.lmao.ninja for Global API. 
• Laura Reen for app icon. 
• Flaticon for social media icons. 
• Ashish Vaish for his help in fixing bugs.
\u2022 Glide for showing flag images. \n\u2022 Eaze Graph for showing Pie charts. \n\u2022 Circle ImageView for showing my pic xD lol.

• Added district wise data.
• Sorted global data according to cases.
• Added total cases screen for global data.
• Fix navbar colour.
• Added update notifier for new updates.
• Added changelog alert dialog when app is opened first time.
